490.long_description: Elevate your spring-summer wardrobe with our cotton chinos, crafted in Northern Italy from lightweight and durable whipcord cotton. This breathable fabric is blended with 3% elastane for added stretch ensuring a more comfortable and easier fit. Our chinos feature a mid-rise and slightly tapered fit, designed to provide a refined and sophisticated look. With a focus on practicality, this piece is tailored with four convenient pockets and bespoke details such as a concealed triple button closure, an internal waistband to keep your shirt neatly tucked in and a central fastener to secure your belt in place. Build the foundation of your spring-summer wardrobe with this versatile design that can be dressed up with one of our [b][u][url="/shop/best-sellers" title="signature shirts"]signature shirts[/url][/u][/b] or dressed down with our [b][u][url="/shop/polos" title="polo shirts"]polo shirts[/url][/u][/b] or [b][u][url="/shop/t-shirts" title="t-shirts"]t-shirts[/url][/u][/b] to create a classic or casual look.

491.long_description: Timeless and versatile, these incredibly soft scarves are knitted from 100% pure Cariaggi Cashmere.

492.long_description: The Amalfi polo shirt is crafted from a luxurious blend of 60% silk and 40% cotton sourced from Piedmont, knitted with gauge 28. This superior cloth offers unparalleled breathability and is highly absorbent, making it the perfect choice for all-year-round wearability. This unique polo shirt is designed with rare sartorial details such as the cuffs of our traditional classic shirts and mother of pearl buttons, effortlessly bridging the gap between casual and formal wear. The three-button standard collar and English-concealed double-stitched seams add a touch of sophistication. Whether you choose to roll up the sleeves for a laid-back look or keep them down for a pristine evening attire, this polo epitomises timeless elegance and versatility. Our curated range of beautiful Italian shades offers the perfect choice for any season. Pair your Amalfi with our [b][u][url="/shop/chinos" title="cotton chinos"]cotton chinos[/url][/u][/b], [b][u][url="/shop/lipari-linen-trousers" title="linen trousers"]linen trousers[/url][/u][/b] or [b][u][url="/shop/cotton-shorts" title="cotton shorts"]cotton shorts[/url][/u][/b].

This cotton is brushed on the face side, creating a light, soft and silky texture that helps to trap heat while remaining breathable. It features the ‘paramontura’ collar for a perfect and lasting shape and mother of pearl buttons, resulting in an overall classic look. This piece is perfect for the office and for the weekend. Pre-washed to avoid shrinkage.

[b]Natural Stretch Linen Cloth[/b] Crafted in Northern Italy from precious and exclusive natural raw fibres treated with an innovative ‘Relax Formula’ that creates a comfortable natural stretch. The result is a resistant and breathable cloth with a pleasing smooth handle. The natural elasticity, obtained without using a synthetic treatment, creates satisfying pleasant wearability, which is less settable to creasing compared to a traditional linen suit whilst keeping its shape better. This distinguished suit jacket is your go-to for special occasions and when the dress code is business-casual and will add a refined touch to your look. Wear yours with our classic linen shirt and matching linen suit trousers to complete the look or a linen T for a more casual approach.

Its highly absorbent and breathable properties make it the perfect choice for staying cool and comfortable. The contemporary design, characterised by its fluid drape and streamlined silhouette elevates an adventurous attire from shoreside leisure to summer getaways. Available in an array of fun colours to match any occasion for the season.

Snap front closure
Talon bell-tab zip fly
